name: @touchspin/jquery-plugin
description: jQuery wrapper for TouchSpin core (delegates to core, preserves API/events)
author: TouchSpin Contributors

scripts.build: yarn run build:deps && rm -rf dist && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:js && yarn run build:iife && yarn run build:umd-bs3 && yarn run build:umd-bs4 && yarn run build:umd-bs5
scripts.build:iife: tsup src/index.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinJQ --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:umd-bs3: tsup src/jquery-touchspin-bs3.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinBS3 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist --external=none
scripts.build:umd-bs4: tsup src/jquery-touchspin-bs4.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinBS4 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist --external=none
scripts.build:umd-bs5: tsup src/jquery-touchspin-bs5.ts --format iife --global-name TouchSpinBS5 --no-dts --sourcemap --target es2018 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist --external=none
scripts.build:test: tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && node ../../scripts/extract-framework-assets.mjs --renderer jquery && node ../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir devdist esmEntry=index.js
scripts.test: node ../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/jquery-plugin/tests && cd ../.. && playwright test packages/jquery-plugin/tests/
